sn35.167:1.3: “kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṃ passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyatī”ti?
sn35.167:1.4: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.167:1.5: Rūpe anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.167:1.6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.167:1.7: Cakkhusamphassaṃ anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.167:1.8: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyati …pe…
sn35.167:1.9: jivhaṃ anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyati …pe…
sn35.167:1.10: manaṃ anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.167:1.14: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anattato jānato passato attānudiṭṭhi pahīyatī”ti.
